snippet: It was not immediately clear what had caused the explosion at the 22-story Trader’s Hotel, but it was the latest in a series of unexplained blasts around the country.
lead_paragraph: It was not immediately clear what had caused the explosion at the 22-story Trader’s Hotel, but it was the latest in a series of unexplained blasts around the country.

headline.main: Myanmar: American Hurt in Hotel Blast
